FuncDef: This command specifies the RSVP or static LSP in this SDP to use to forward VPLS multicast and broadcast packets. The LSP name must exist and must have been associated with this SDP using the commandconfig>service>sdp>lsp. In the absence of an explicit configuration by the user, the default LSP is used.
ExtraInfo: Default: no multicast-lsp - traffic mapped to default-lsp name
